tha-ap532:9.3: Āsahaṃ dhanadhaññassa → āsabhaṃ dhanadhaññassa (s2, s3) | anantadhanadhaññassa (mr)
tha-ap532:11.3: Haṃsarutehi nigghosaṃ → haṃsarudābhinigghosaṃ (bj) | haṃsadundubhinigghosaṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
tha-ap532:24.4: hantā ātāpī tāpaso → tāpitā ca visositā (s2, s3) | hantā tātāpi tāpaso (pts1)
tha-ap532:30.4: sabbagandhova hoti me → sabbagandhotiseti me (bj, pts1)
tha-ap532:32.2: Phalaṃ tu → phalantaṃ (s2, s3) | phalan tu (pts1)
tha-ap532:33.2: hitāya ca na sadisaṃ → hitāya janasandhisu (bj, pts1) | hitāyanaṃ sukhāvahaṃ (s2, s3)
tha-ap532:33.4: saṃgho vīrasamāyuto → saraddhanisamāyuto (bj) | saṅgho vīrasamāsuto (s2, s3) | rasaddhovisamāyuto (pts1)
tha-ap532:35.1: Khīṇe āyusi → khīṇe pāsusi (s2, s3) | khīṇevāyupi (pts1)
tha-ap532:39.1: titthikākiṇṇe → janoghe titthakākiṇṇe (bj) | jino yo titthikātiṇṇo (s2, s3) | janoghe titthikākiṇṇo (pts1)
tha-ap532:42.4: paribhūto na tenahaṃ → paribhūtena tenahaṃ (s2, s3)
